name: Great Barrington Mobile Clinics
address: 475 South Main Street, Great Barrington MA, 01230
info: THIS CLINIC WILL BE AT THE BHS TESTING SITE IN GREAT BARRINGTON. Everyone 12+ in Massachusetts is eligible.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
